attributes.action: Politicians to be legally held to honour the vote of their constituents.
attributes.additional_details: Anyone with any integrity or honesty will just need to look at the current abuse of power and resentment for the people of this once great country
attributes.background: Politicians are elected by their constituents, if their constituents vote overwhelmingly in any voted matter, the politicians are to honour the vote of their constituents.  Failure to do this is an affront to democracy, and should be considered an abuse of position in public office.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by "any voted matter".

You could sign this petition instead if you would like constituents to be able to vote to remove an MP who they thought was not acting in their interests:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/236800
